speaker: Time
text_entry: SCENE II. Bohemia. The palace of POLIXENES.

speaker: Time
text_entry: Enter POLIXENES and CAMILLO

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: I pray thee, good Camillo, be no more importunate:

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: 'tis a sickness denying thee any thing; a death to

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: grant this.

speaker: CAMILLO
text_entry: It is fifteen years since I saw my country: though

speaker: CAMILLO
text_entry: I have for the most part been aired abroad, I

speaker: CAMILLO
text_entry: desire to lay my bones there. Besides, the penitent

speaker: CAMILLO
text_entry: king, my master, hath sent for me; to whose feeling

speaker: CAMILLO
text_entry: sorrows I might be some allay, or I o'erween to

speaker: CAMILLO
text_entry: think so, which is another spur to my departure.

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: As thou lovest me, Camillo, wipe not out the rest of

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: thy services by leaving me now: the need I have of

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: thee thine own goodness hath made; better not to

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: have had thee than thus to want thee: thou, having

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: made me businesses which none without thee can

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: sufficiently manage, must either stay to execute

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: them thyself or take away with thee the very

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: services thou hast done; which if I have not enough

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: considered, as too much I cannot, to be more

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: thankful to thee shall be my study, and my profit

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: therein the heaping friendships. Of that fatal

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: country, Sicilia, prithee speak no more; whose very

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: naming punishes me with the remembrance of that

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: penitent, as thou callest him, and reconciled king,

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: my brother; whose loss of his most precious queen

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: and children are even now to be afresh lamented.

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: Say to me, when sawest thou the Prince Florizel, my

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: son? Kings are no less unhappy, their issue not

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: being gracious, than they are in losing them when

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: they have approved their virtues.

speaker: CAMILLO
text_entry: Sir, it is three days since I saw the prince. What

speaker: CAMILLO
text_entry: his happier affairs may be, are to me unknown: but I

speaker: CAMILLO
text_entry: have missingly noted, he is of late much retired

speaker: CAMILLO
text_entry: from court and is less frequent to his princely

speaker: CAMILLO
text_entry: exercises than formerly he hath appeared.

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: I have considered so much, Camillo, and with some

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: care; so far that I have eyes under my service which

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: look upon his removedness; from whom I have this

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: intelligence, that he is seldom from the house of a

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: most homely shepherd; a man, they say, that from

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: very nothing, and beyond the imagination of his

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: neighbours, is grown into an unspeakable estate.

speaker: CAMILLO
text_entry: I have heard, sir, of such a man, who hath a

speaker: CAMILLO
text_entry: daughter of most rare note: the report of her is

speaker: CAMILLO
text_entry: extended more than can be thought to begin from such a cottage.

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: That's likewise part of my intelligence; but, I

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: fear, the angle that plucks our son thither. Thou

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: shalt accompany us to the place; where we will, not

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: appearing what we are, have some question with the

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: shepherd; from whose simplicity I think it not

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: uneasy to get the cause of my son's resort thither.

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: Prithee, be my present partner in this business, and

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: lay aside the thoughts of Sicilia.

speaker: CAMILLO
text_entry: I willingly obey your command.

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: My best Camillo! We must disguise ourselves.

speaker: POLIXENES
text_entry: Exeunt
